CustomField.description: Pulls first name of Contact and Contact 2 from Lab; used by Handwrytten for baby's birthday cards.
CustomField.formula: Lab__r.Mother_s_First_Name__c & if( NOT(ISBLANK ( Lab__r.Father_s_First_Name__c )), " and " & Lab__r.Father_s_First_Name__c, null)
CustomField.label: Parents First Names
